   pramathāścāpi saṃrabdhā jaghnustūryāṇyanekaśaḥ // VamP_42.2 //	pramaTAH ca api saMrabDAH jaGnuH tUryANi anekaSas // VamP_42.2 //
   sa cāvṛṇonmahānādo rodasī pralayopamaḥ /	sa ca AvRNot mahA nAdaH rodasI pralaya upamaH /
   śuśrāva vāyumārgastho vighnarājo vināyakaḥ // VamP_42.3 //	SuSrAva vAyu mArga sTaH viGnarAjaH vinAyakaH // VamP_42.3 //
   samabhyayāt susaṃkruddhaḥ pramathairabhisaṃvṛtaḥ /	samaByayAt su saMkrudDaH pramaTEH aBisaMvRtaH /

   praṇipatya tathā bhaktyā vākyamāha maheśvaram /	praNipatya taTA BaktyA vAkyam Aha maheSvaram /

   tato vighneśavacanājjagannātho 'mbikāṃ vacaḥ /	tatas viGneSa vacanAt jagannATaH ambikAm vacaH /

   tato haraḥ prāha vaco yaśasyaṃ mālinīmapi /	tatas haraH prAha vacaH yaSasyam mAlinIm api /
   jayāṃ ca vijayāṃ caiva jayantīṃ cāparājitām // VamP_42.9 //	jayAm ca vijayAm ca eva jayantIm ca aparAjitAm // VamP_42.9 //
   yuṣmābhirapramattābhiḥ stheyaṃ gehe surakṣite /	yuzmABiH apramattABiH sTeyam gehe su rakzite /
   rakṣaṇīyā prayatnena giriputrī pramādataḥ // VamP_42.10 //	rakzaNIyA prayatnena giri putrI pramAdataH // VamP_42.10 //
   iti saṃdiśya tāḥ sarvāḥ samāruhya vṛṣaṃ vibhuḥ /	iti saMdiSya tAH sarvAH samAruhya vRzam viBuH /
   nirjagāma gṛhāt tuṣṭo jayepsuḥ śūladhṛg balī // VamP_42.11 //	nirjagAma gRhAt tuzwaH jaya IpsuH SUla DRk balI // VamP_42.11 //
   nirgacchatastu bhavanādīśvarasya gaṇādhipāḥ /	nirgacCataH tu BavanAt ISvarasya gaNADipAH /

   raṇāya nirgacchati lokapāle maheśvare śūladhare maharṣe /	raNAya nirgacCati lokapAle maheSvare SUlaDare mahA Rze /
   śubhāni saumyāni sumaṅgalāni jātānī cihnāni jayāya śaṃbhoḥ // VamP_42.13	SuBAni sOmyAni su maFgalAni jAtAnI cihnAni jayAya SaMBoH // VamP_42.13
   śivā sthitā vāmatare 'tha bhāge prayāti cāgre svanamunnadantī /	SivA sTitA vAmatare aTa BAge prayAti ca agre svanam unnadantI /

   VamP_42.14 //	VamP_42.14 //
   dakṣiṇāṅgaṃ nakhāntaṃ vai samakampata śūlinaḥ /	dakziNa aFgam naKa antam vE samakampata SUlinaH /

   tacchaṃbhuvacanaṃ śrutvā śailādiḥ prāha saṃkaram /	tat SaMBu vacanam SrutvA SElAdiH prAha saMkaram /

   te 'bhyetya dānavabalaṃ mardayanti sma vegitāḥ /	te aByetya dAnava balam mardayanti sma vegitAH /

   te vadhyamānā balibhiḥ pramathairdaityadānavāḥ /	te vaDyamAnAH baliBiH pramaTEH dEtya dAnavAH /

   tato 'mbaratale devāḥ sendraviṣṇupitāmahāḥ /	tatas ambara tale devAH sa indra vizNu pitAmahAH /

   tato 'mbaratale ghoṣaḥ sasvanaḥ samajāyata /	tatas ambara tale GozaH sa svanaH samajAyata /

   tataḥ paśyatsu deveṣu mahāpāśupatādayaḥ /	tatas paSyatsu devezu mahA pASupata AdayaH /

   krodhānvitastuhuṇḍastu vegonābisasāra ha // VamP_42.25 //	kroDa anvitaH tuhuNxaH tu vegonAbisasAra ha // VamP_42.25 //
   ādāya parighaṃ ghoraṃ paṭṭodbddhamayasmayam /	AdAya pariGam Goram pawwa udbdDam ayasmayam /
   rājataṃ rājate 'tyarthamindradhvajamivocchritam // VamP_42.26 //	rAjatam rAjate atyarTam indra Dvajam iva ucCritam // VamP_42.26 //
   taṃ bhrāmayāno balavān nijaghāna raṇe gaṇān /	tam BrAmayAnaH balavAn nijaGAna raNe gaNAn /

   tatprabhagnaṃ balaṃ dṛṣṭvā gaṇanātho vināyakaḥ /	tad praBagnam balam dRzwvA gaNanATaH vinAyakaH /

   parighaṃ viphalaṃ dṛṣṭvā samāyāntaṃ ca pārṣadam /	pariGam viPalam dRzwvA samAyAntam ca pArzadam /
   babandha bāhupāśena rāhū rakṣan hi mātulam // VamP_42.31 //	babanDa bAhu pASena rAhuH rakzan hi mAtulam // VamP_42.31 //

   vināyakaṃ saṃyatamīkṣya rāhuṇā kuṇḍodaro nāma gaṇeśvaro 'tha /	vinAyakam saMyatam Ikzya rAhuNA kuNxodaraH nAma gaNeSvaraH aTa /
   pragṛhya tūrṇa muśalaṃ mahātmā rāhuṃ durātmānamasau jaghāna // VamP_42.34	pragRhya tUrNa muSalam mahAtmA rAhum durAtmAnam asO jaGAna // VamP_42.34

   pañcaikakālānalasannikāśā viśānti senāṃ danupuṅgavānām // VamP_42.37 //	paQca eka kAla anala sannikASAH viSAnti senAm danu puFgavAnAm // VamP_42.37 //

   VamP_42.41 //	VamP_42.41 //

   baliṃ sambhyetya jaghāna mūrdhni saṃmohitaḥ so 'vanimāsasāda // VamP_42.42	balim samByetya jaGAna mUrDni saMmohitaH saH avanimAsasAda // VamP_42.42

   VamP_42.57 //	VamP_42.57 //

   te śocyā banadhūnāṃ jīvanto 'pīha mṛtatulyāḥ // VamP_68.68 //	te SocyAH banaDUnAm jIvantaH api iha mRta tulyAH // VamP_68.68 //
   āpadgrāhagṛhītānāṃ vṛddhāḥ santi na paṇḍitāḥ /	Apad grAha gRhItAnAm vRdDAH santi na paNxitAH /

   vṛddhavākyairvinā nūnaṃ naivottāraṃ kathañcana // VamP_68.70 //	vRdDa vAkyEH vinA nUnam na eva uttAram kaTaQcana // VamP_68.70 //
   tasmād yo vṛddhavākyāni śṛṇuyād vidadhāti ca /	tasmAt yaH vRdDa vAkyAni SRNuyAt vidaDAti ca /
   sa sadyaḥ siddhimāpnoti yathā vairocano baliḥ // VamP_68.71 //	sa sadyas sidDim Apnoti yaTA vErocanaH baliH // VamP_68.71 //
   iti śrīvāmanapurāṇe aṣṭaṣaṣṭitamo 'dhyāyaḥ	iti SrI vAmanapurANe azwazazwitamaH aDyAyaH
   pulastya uvāca /	pulastyaH uvAca /
   etanmayā puṇyatamaṃ purāṇaṃ tubhyaṃ tathā nārada kīrtitaṃ vai /	etat mayA puNyatamam purANam tuByam taTA nArada kIrtitam vE /
   śrutvā ca kīrtyā parayā sameto bhaktyā ca viṣṇoḥ padamabhyupaiti //	SrutvA ca kIrtyA parayA sametaH BaktyA ca vizNoH padam aByupEti //
   VamP_69.1 //	VamP_69.1 //
   yathā pāpāni pūyante gaṅgāvārivigāhanāt /	yaTA pApAni pUyante gaFgA vAri vigAhanAt /

   na tasya rogā jāyante na viṣaṃ cābhicārikam /	na tasya rogAH jAyante na vizam ca ABicArikam /
   śarīre ca kule brahman yaḥ śruṇoti ca vāmanam // VamP_69.3 //	SarIre ca kule brahman yaH SruNoti ca vAmanam // VamP_69.3 //
   śraṇoti nityaṃ vidhivacca bhaktyā saṃpūjayan yaḥ praṇataśca viṣṇum /	SraNoti nityam viDivat ca BaktyA saMpUjayan yaH praNataH ca vizNum /
   sa cāśvamedhasya sadakṣiṇasya phalaṃ samagraṃ parihinapāpaḥ // VamP_69.4	sa ca aSvameDasya sa dakziNasya Palam samagram parihina pApaH // VamP_69.4
   prāpnoti dattasya suvarṇabhūmeraśvasya gonāgarathasya caiva nārī naraścāpi	prApnoti dattasya suvarNa BUmeH aSvasya go nAga raTasya ca eva nArI naraH ca api
   ca pādamekaṃ śṛṇvan śuciḥ puṇyatamaḥ pṛthivyām /	ca pAdam ekam SRNvan SuciH puNyatamaH pRTivyAm /
   69.5 snāne kṛte tīrthavare supuṇye gaṅgājale naimiṣapuṣkare vā /	69.5 snAne kRte tIrTa vare su puNye gaFgA jale nEmiza puzkare vA /
   kokāmukhe yat pravadanti viprāḥ prayāgamāsādya ca māghamāse // VamP_69.6	kokAmuKe yat pravadanti viprAH prayAgam AsAdya ca mAGa mAse // VamP_69.6
   sa tatphalaṃ prāpya ca vāmanasya saṃkīrtayan nānyamanāḥ padaṃ hi /	sa tad Palam prApya ca vAmanasya saMkIrtayan na anya manAH padam hi /
   gacchenmayā nārada te 'dya coktaṃ yad rājasūyasya phalaṃ prayacchet //	gacCet mayA nArada te adya ca uktam yat rAjasUyasya Palam prayacCet //
   VamP_69.7 //	VamP_69.7 //

   VamP_69.8 //	VamP_69.8 //
   ratnasya dānasya ca yatphalaṃ bhaved yatsūryasya cendorgrahaṇe ca rāhoḥ /	ratnasya dAnasya ca yat Palam Bavet yat sUryasya ca indoH grahaNe ca rAhoH /
   annasya dānena phalaṃ yathoktaṃ bubhukṣite vipravare ca sāgnike //	annasya dAnena Palam yaToktam buBukzite vipra vare ca sa agnike //

   VamP_69.10 //	VamP_69.10 //
   caturdaśaṃ vāmanamāhuragryaṃ śrute ca yasyāghacayāśca nāśam /	caturdaSam vAmanam AhuH agryam Srute ca yasya aGa cayAH ca nASam /
   prayānti nāstyatra ca saṃśayo me mahānti pāpānyapi nāradāśu // VamP_69.11	prayAnti na asti atra ca saMSayaH me mahAnti pApAni api nArada ASu // VamP_69.11

   idaṃ rahasyaṃ paramaṃ tavoktaṃ na vācyametaddharibhaktivarjite /	idam rahasyam paramam tava uktam na vAcyam etat hari Bakti varjite /
   dvijasya nindāratihinadakṣiṇe sahetuvākyāvṛtapāpasattve // VamP_69.13 //	dvijasya nindA arati hina dakziNe sa hetu vAkya AvRta pApa sattve // VamP_69.13 //
   namo namaḥ kāraṇa vāmanāya nityaṃ yo vadenniyataṃ dvijaḥ /	namaH namaH kAraNa vAmanAya nityam yaH vadet niyatam dvijaH /
   tasya viṣṇuḥ padaṃ mokṣaṃ dadāti surapūjitaḥ // VamP_69.14 //	tasya vizNuH padam mokzam dadAti sura pUjitaH // VamP_69.14 //

   trisaṃdhyaṃ ca paṭhan śṛṇvan sarvapāpapraṇāśanam /	trisaMDyam ca paWan SRNvan sarva pApa praNASanam /
